Description: Rim sherd of Chian Mature Animal Style pottery heavy chalice; white slip; interior: reserved band at rim, glazed streaky black below (mostly worn); part of a lotus flower in added white outline with added red centre; top of rim glazed; exterior: guilloche band at rim between lines; below, part of undetermined motif and part of pendant triangle as filling ornament.
Curator's comments: For parallels regarding the rim pattern, see Oxford AN1925.608e(14) from Naukratis.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GD.1540) (phase 2)
